title: Injuu Gakuen EX (Lady Blue)
synopsis: Miko Mido has fallen in love for the first time. Too bad for her that she hasn't the time to pursue the man of her dreams. There is a mysterious female ghost which is attacking Miko's schoolmates and stealing their life-force, and someone has to investigate the case. However, it seems that the ominous phantom is willing to pursue Miko's love interest, too...
related_anime: ['Injuu Gakuen La☆Blue Girl: Fukkatsu-hen', 'Injuu Gakuen La Blue Girl', 'La☆Blue Girl']
